PushMessages.FCM.Enable.title: Firebase cloud messaging (FCM) activation
PushMessages.FCM.Enable.description: Enable/ disable Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM). Additional configuration is required. Use following link for configuration https://docs.virtocommerce.org/platform/user-guide/push-messages/firebase-cloud-messaging/

PushMessages.BatchSize.title: Batch size
PushMessages.BatchSize.description: Define the number of messages sent per batch

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ApiKey.title: ApiKey
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ApiKey.description: Authorize your app to access Firebase services

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AuthDoma.title: AuthDomain
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AuthDoma.description: Set a domain where authentication requests are processed for your Firebase project

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ProjectI.title: ProjectId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.ProjectI.description: Name your Firebase project to link all Fibebase services together under one project

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.StorageB.title: StorageBucket
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.StorageB.description: Set URL for your Firebase Cloud Storage, where files associated with the project can be stored

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.Messagin.title: MessagingSenderId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.Messagin.description: Set Id to identify the sender and to send messages from your Firebase project to user devices

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AppId.title: AppId
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.AppId.description: Link messages to your specific application

PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.VapidKey.title: VapidKey
PushMessages.FcmReceiverOptions.VapidKey.description: Set key used for Web Push protocols to help authenticate web-based push messages sent from your application

PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.title: Cron expression for scheduled messages recurring job
PushMessages.SendScheduledMessagesRecurr.description: Configure to schedule automated messages. '0/5****' means that messages will be sent every 5 minutes

PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.title: Cron expression for tracking new recipients recurring job
PushMessages.TrackNewRecipientsRecurring.description: Configure to check for new recipients. '0 0/1' means that messages will be sent every minute
